title: Can't install on mac
body:
Hi,
i'm trying to install remix based on docs.

Any help is highly appreciated.


```
zzz@zzz-MacBook-Pro-16 remix-project % node --version
v20.5.1
zzz@zzz-MacBook-Pro-16 remix-project % npm --version 
9.8.0
zzz@zzz-MacBook-Pro-16 remix-project % yarn --version
1.22.19
zzz@zzz-MacBook-Pro-16 remix-project % yarn install  
yarn install v1.22.19
[1/5] üîç  Validating package.json...
```
